channel.title: CVE Feed for Automox -- Automox Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Automox -- Automox Agent

item.title: CVE-2021-26908|2024-08-03T20:33:41.358Z -- automox -- automox%20agent
item.description: Automox Agent prior to version 31 logs potentially sensitive information in local log files, which could be used by a locally-authenticated attacker to subvert an organization's security program. The issue has since been fixed in version 31 of the Automox Agent.

item.title: CVE-2021-26909|2024-08-03T20:33:41.259Z -- automox -- automox%20agent
item.description: Automox Agent prior to version 31 uses an insufficiently protected S3 bucket endpoint for storing sensitive files, which could be brute-forced by an attacker to subvert an organization's security program. The issue has since been fixed in version 31 of the Automox Agent.
